alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:17PM MST until January 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Madison and Beaverhead River Valleys, Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains, and Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
